p: This study is designed according to the PRISMA statement [ 43]. A systematic literature search was conducted on the online databases including Google Scholar, Pubmed Medline, Scopus, and the Cochrane Library until June 2019. The key search terms were: (naltrexone and HIV and alcohol) or (naltrexone and HIV and drinking) or (naltrexone and AIDS and alcohol) or (naltrexone and AIDS and drinking) or (Vivitrol and HIV and alcohol) or (Vivitrol and HIV and drinking) or (Vivitrol and AIDS and alcohol) or (Vivitrol and AIDS and alcohol) or (Revia and HIV and alcohol) or (Revia and HIV and drinking) or (Revia and AIDS and alcohol) or (Revia and AIDS and alcohol).
